channel.description: Recent content in gradient boosted trees on Data Trigger

item.title: Gradient tree boosting in the cloud
item.author: contact@datatrigger.org (Vincent Le Goualher)
item.description: A cloud computing experiment with two slightly different implementations of gradient boosted trees LightGBM and XGBoost. Let us evaluate how these two algorithms do on a moderately large dataset, regarding both accuracy and speed.
